name: Super Beast Hunt ~Prologue~
description:
-STORY-
Victoria is a barista who works at a famous cafe. But trouble strikes when she realises there's no meat! Only she is capable of finding some, as long as she can brave the deadly Beasts.

-FEATURES-
-Platforming
-A silly protagonist. Look how silly she is!
-Evil Beasts to jump on and stuff.
-One secret, just for you.

This is a short single level demo for the full version of Super Beast Hunt. The fully game is currently planned to feature over 20 crazy levels, 5 scary bosses, some sneaky secrets, and many more evil wicked vile Beasts!

You can keep up with development of the game on my twitter, my other twitter, or my tumblr.

                         

-CREDITS-
Developed by WOAH_MAAANMusic composed by MelonMungus
